title: Nero Platinum 2015 Extras v.16.0.05500
description:
Nero Platinum 2015 - The best multimedia suite
2015 Nero Platinum - allows you to create and share photo, music and videos. With it you really have a complete suite, which includes intuitive video editing function however advanced, the innovative video file conversion technology for viewing movies on any device, plus burning and backup to meet all your needs for working with digital content.
Nero Platinum 2015 offers a number of useful tools and easy to use for users with specific goals and different levels of training. Newbies will like the only media library, designed for centralized management of digital content (audio, video and photographs), preparation of materials and their distribution over the Internet. And experts will appreciate the available tools for editing multimedia data and greater support for modern formats such as Blu-ray. The application supports the import of materials with AVCHD and DSLR cameras, smartphones and other devices, and allows you to convert videos for later playback on your Xbox 360, PS3 / PS Vita, iPhone, iPad, Kindle Fire, Android tablets and smartphones, and other .
Nero Platinum 2015 offers everything you need for video editing and image quality. The Nero Platinum 2015 Framework version also included additional artistic effects let you stylize the current file under the old movie in black and white (available only in version). Users will be able to engage in Rip DVD or Blu-ray, as well as using the best tools in the Nero Burning ROM industry to "burn" the data on optical media. By the way, thanks to the integration of the product with the Windows operating system required files can be sent to record directly from your desktop (just select the objects, click the right button and select Burn with Nero from the context menu). Finished videos and slideshows can also be easily published on YouTube, MySpace, Flickr anddirectly from the application interface.

Applications that are part of Nero:

Dozens of models to movies and discs a professional look.

Moreover, this application supports pre-defined profiles for the most popular mobile and entertainment devices, so you can achieve remarkable results, even if you do not want to fully understand the technology.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Nero BackItUp. Nero BackItUp will protect your data against possible failures. Schedule regular backups of files, folders or entire PC and then select one of the many supported devices.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Nero RescueAgent. An additional layer of protection that will maintain the security of your most important files. Easily recover corrupted files on optical discs, PC, USB storage devices and other media with the help of Ner RescueAgent.

With it you can play the tracks in the library, import new music from CDs as well as create new playlists and sync these lists or albums with any mobile device connected to a wireless network as well as via USB.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Nero Express. If all you need - it's fast burn or copy a disc, Nero Express qualitatively perform this task.

What's new in Nero 2015 Platinum?
It is Nero you ever loved, with 10 amazing features you've always wanted.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ To transmit video to any iOS and Android device
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Nero AirBurn: Burn files directly from your Android and iOS device
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Find and tag photos and videos with places (Geotags)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New Nero launcher with instant access to the entire suite

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Hollywood-grade font styles and moving text effects to videos
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instant access to your Nero cloud - Five new mobile application to help you learn and master Nero 2015
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Stream to any TV or media player with auto-transcoding
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Even faster converting and burning video

Extra features
Nero, by itself comes with some interesting features, such as Nero Video is a great video editor. But we can add more features in Nero and many of these are available on the developer's site, which also put here for us to use a broader way this program.
To install the extra features, turn the menu and click on "Extras". Then we have the following extra features: Nero Video, Nero Wave Editor, Nero Cover Design, Nero SoundTrax, Nero Drive Speed, Nero Burn Rights Nero InCD Reader and Nero Clean Tool. To install is very simple. Just go back to the main menu and click on "Extras"
Description of included some extra programs

Nero WaveEditor
Record and edit audio files using various filters and optimization methods

Name: Nero Platinum 2015 + Extras
Version: 16.0.05500
Size: 1:25 GB
Platform: Windows
Language: Multilanguage

Installation:
01-Nero Uninstall any program on your PC. For this use the "Nero Clean Tool" present in this release
02- Click "Install" and install the program normally, at the end do not restart your PC (Use the serial Nero himself during installation)
03-Return to the "Menu", click "Activator 2015" and confirm by clicking on "OK"!
04- Ready! Now just enjoy your new Nero 2015

Installing Extras
I put this release several key extra programs for use of Nero 2015
To install extra programs click on "Extras" in the menu and choose one of your own
To see the IDs of extra programs simply place your mouse over each one of them

CAUTIONARY
It is normal to take a while for the program to run! Any program takes up 500MB same. This is more than 1GB, therefore, wait a minute everything will work! I could have finished him in the .ISO format, but to make it easier to use I chose to .EXE. So any usurer can use it without any problems and without the need to install any emulator (except Windows 8.1 that already emulates directly).
